## Generative Art: Part 1

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
msleep %>% 
  ggplot(aes(sleep_total, awake, color=vore, size=bodywt)) + 
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE, size = 20, shape = 19) +
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE, size = 10, shape = 3,  stroke = .5, colour = "white") + 
  geom_point(show.legend = FALSE, size = 15, colour = "white", shape = 1,  stroke = 2) +
  geom_abline(intercept = 13, slope = -3,  colour="lightblue")+
  scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0, .5)) +
  coord_radial(start = -100 * pi, end = - 2 * pi, inner.radius = 0.5, rotate.angle = TRUE,
               expand = FALSE, direction = -1) + 
  theme_void() + 
  scale_color_brewer()
```
